solution_line_template: From the first set of meals, the restaurant earned {meals_set1_quantity} meals * ${meals_set1_price} = $<<{meals_set1_quantity}*{meals_set1_price}={earnings_set1}>>{earnings_set1}.
From the second set of meals, the restaurant earned {meals_set2_quantity} meals * ${meals_set2_price} = $<<{meals_set2_quantity}*{meals_set2_price}={earnings_set2}>>{earnings_set2}.
From the third set of meals, the restaurant earned {meals_set3_quantity} meals * ${meals_set3_price} = $<<{meals_set3_quantity}*{meals_set3_price}={earnings_set3}>>{earnings_set3}.
